description: PWGSC, on behalf of Correctional Service Canada, is issuing this request for standing offers (RFSO) for the acquisition of halal meat products including delivery to 2 regions: Montreal and Quebec.
tags: Honduras, Peru, Colombia, Panama, Chile, and Korea, UK, and Canada-France
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement for Halal Meat Products**
======================================================

**Tender Reference:** WS3800971876-Doc4209306731

**Public Notice Date:** September 13, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** September 29, 2023 @ 2:00 PM (Local Time)

**Addendum:** None

**Tender Type:** Request for Standing Offers (RFSO)

**Goods/Services:** Acquisition of Halal Meat Products

**Quantity:** Not specified

**Bidder's Eligibility:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Awarding Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Contracting Entity Address:**

* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5
* Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Alina Cocieru (elle-la / she-her)
* Email: [alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17439009?extsite=MTc0MzkwMDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Notice Description:** 

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Correctional Service Canada, is issuing a request for standing offers (RFSO) for the acquisition of Halal meat products. Delivery shall be made to 2 regions, namely Montreal and Donnacona (Quebec). The tender includes detailed quantities and specifications that will be outlined in the solicitation document. 

**Trade Agreements:** This tender is open to bidders under various trade agreements including but not limited to, the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) and others as detailed in the solicitation documents. 

**Regions of Opportunity:** The successful bidder shall be required to deliver the goods to the following regions: Montreal and Donnacona (Quebec). 

**Regions of Delivery:** The goods shall be delivered to the following locations: 

* Montreal
* Donnacona (Quebec)

**Tender Deadline:** The tender submission deadline is September 29, 2023 @ 2:00 PM
